      • accept

        public boolean accept(java.lang.String path)
        Description copied from interface: WebSocketHandler
        Before sending back a response for a WebSocket handshake the server will first call the WebSocketHandler.accept(java.lang.String) method to see if the WebSocket should be accepted at that path.
        Specified by:
        accept in interface WebSocketHandler
        Parameters:
        path - The path of the WebSocket upgrade request
        Returns:
        true to accept the WebSocket, or false to reject it. Rejected upgrade requests will have a 404 served to them
